description:

This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase with exposed brick accent. Kitchen has new stainless steel appliances and granite counter top. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor. Bathroom has a jacuzzi tub in it. Second floor has two small bedrooms.
Room one has ceiling fan, vaulted ceilings, a pass through, closet, and extra storage.
Room two has closet, recessed lights, and hardwood floors.
The fenced in yard has a slate patio and space to garden.

The house is only two blocks from the University of Pennsylvania. Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores all near by. title: one bedroom with private backyard
description:
This is a first floor rear apartment that includes one bedroom, living room with kitchen, and tiled bathroom. Hardwood floors throughout! Private, grassy yard is perfect for a cookout and entertaining.  Located in a historic house on a beautiful, tree-lined street with friendly neighbors in University City. Just a few blocks from green line trolley routes 13 and 34, taking you directly downtown in about 15 minutes. Walking distance to Penn, Drexel, USP, CHOP, VA Hospital complex, Science Center. On street parking readily available.
Available July 1, 2022 for a 12 month lease. Utilities not included, however, the apartment has its own gas hot water heater and efficient gas boiler, so you only pay for what you use. We own and manage the building and are on-call all the time. This is not run by a large management company. Call or text John anytime for an appointment.

title: Great studio apartment for May or June relet!
description:
Great studio apartment at 4200 Spruce Street for lease takeover starting May 7th until August 23rd (move-in date flexible)! I don't believe anyone has signed the lease for next year so it may be available for next year as well. Rent is $945 per month but will relet at 800 for a May or June move in and includes everything except wifi and electric. The unit has an updated kitchen with new appliances, dishwasher, and lots of cabinet space. It also has large closet with tons of storage space and there is a huge balcony that gets a lot of sunlight. It is on the second floor of house with large covered porch and bike rack. There is an AC unit built in and a ceiling fan which are really great during the summer. Laundry is in the building and is free! Unit will be unfurnished as I am moving out.
The neighborhood is very residential and safe, there's a Penn security officer half a block up at night. There are several bus lines that stop right in front of the house which make it very convenient to get around. The Pennbus West which runs at night also will stop right in front if asked.
Please email me with any questions or to see a video, and let me know what date you would be interested in moving in!

Tired of Searching? Having trouble finding a great place? We’ve spent 30 years helping customers winnow through the chaff in order to find the home of their dreams.
Whether you want to enjoy the perks of living in a city, close to bus lines, shopping, and major convenience, or yearn for quiet, secluded country life on acres of land, away from through traffic, we can help.
Looking for a unique, brag-able property? Cottages, carriage houses, single-family homes, townhouses, duplex rentals, house/apartments, bungalows, and more come into our hands all of the time.

Serving all of Montgomery County, and the surrounding areas, with homes and apartments in all parts of the county, from Conshohocken to Greenville to Pottstown, and everything in between
So give us a call today. We’re more than happy to help take the stress away, and help you focus on what’s really important. Look only at rentals that you know will match exactly what you need in your next home.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: New Build House on Winton Street
description:
This brand new construction, on a quiet side road in South Philly's Lower Moyamensing neighborhood, includes 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a finished basement, a patio and a roof deck with spectacular views over the city.
The first floor is an open floor plan, with a bright and airy living room leading through to a modern kitchen with a large center island and lots of cabinet space.

The third floor is dedicated to the master suite, with a large bedroom, a luxurious bathroom with a walk-in rainfall shower, and ample closet space.
The roof deck offers the perfect space to relax or entertain visitors, with open views across the city skyline.
